org.codice.ddf.catalog.security.policy.xml

Class XmlAttributeSecurityPolicyPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.catalog.security.policy.xml.XmlAttributeSecurityPolicyPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PolicyPlugin

    public class XmlAttributeSecurityPolicyPlugin
extends Object
implements PolicyPlugin
    Plugin that parses XML metadata for elements that contain attributes with security policy information
